scripts.serve: concurrently "cd functions; tsc --watch" "firebase serve -o 0.0.0.0" "cd app; parcel serve index.html"
scripts.deploy:app: npm run lint && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run lint && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy: npm run lint && npm run build && firebase deploy
scripts.postinstall: cd functions; npm install; cd ../app; npm install
